situation.title: Keeping in touch with family
situation.meta_description: Consider whether the visit is necessary and whether a call would be sufficient.

content.processed:
Recommendation

Personal contact with family members is allowed. But consider whether the visit is necessary and urgent and whether a call would be sufficient. 

If a face-to-face meeting is urgent, it will be safer if you are visited by a relative who works from home and does not associate with strangers, or with people who recently suffered from COVID-19, and successfully recovered, and were released from isolation. An outdoor place is a suitable for such a meeting.
